refnamediv.refpurpose: Exports your Palm Datebook database into a remind(1) data file format.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Your Datebook database will be written to STDOUT as it is converted unless redirected to a file.

listitem.para: Write out the Datebook (not Calendar) database.

Use device file port to communicate with the Palm handheld. If this is not specified, pilot-reminders will look for the $PILOTPORT environment variable. If neither are found or supplied, pilot-reminders
will print the usage information.

blockquote.para: Display the help synopsis for pilot-reminders and exit without connecting.
Display a brief usage message and exit without connecting.

refsect1.title: Reporting Bugs
refsect1.para: We have an online bug tracker. Using this is the only way to ensure that your bugs are recorded and that we can track them until they are resolved or closed. Reporting bugs via email, while easy, is not very useful in terms of accountability. Please point your browser to http://bugs.pilot-link.org and report your bugs and issues there.
